title: Anthropic Blocks AI Access For Firms Linked To Chinese Communist Party
description: US-based Artificial Intelligence company Anthropic has said it cut off access to its AI model- Claude for firms linked to the Chinese Communist Party (CCP), forgoing several hundred million dollars in revenue

title: WFR Highlights the AI Infrastructure Power Players Transforming Compute
description: The artificial intelligence revolution is expanding far beyond algorithms and breakthrough model architectures. Behind every ChatGPT‑style rollout and generative service lies a sprawling, complex infrastructure: massive GPU clusters, sovereign data centers, hybrid clouds, inference engines, and edge compute networks. This foundational layer is now the center of intense competition and strategic investment, as highlighted in […]

title: Duolingo prioritises user growth over monetisation, forecasts softer bookings
description: As part of the push, Duolingo said it will expand access to its artificial intelligence-powered "Video ​Call with Lily" feature by adding it to its Super Duolingo subscription, rather than limiting it to the ​premium Max tier.
content:

title: Jack Dorsey's Block Cuts 4,000 Jobs Amid AI-Driven Overhaul
description: Block cuts nearly 40% of its workforce, with Jack Dorsey saying artificial intelligence is reshaping how companies are built and run.
content:
Block, the financial technology company that owns Square, Cash App, and Tidal, announced on Thursday that it would slash its workforce by 40%, citing the growing use of “intelligence tools”.
In a detailed note on the job cuts, co-founder and CEO Jack... [3435 chars]

title: Jack Dorsey’s Block to cut 4,000 jobs in AI overhaul; shares jump 25% after hours
description: Block is cutting over 4,000 jobs, nearly half its staff. This move signals how artificial intelligence is changing businesses. CEO Jack Dorsey stated that a smaller team using AI tools can achieve more. Investors are rewarding companies showing AI-driven cost savings. Block expects restructuring charges of up to $500 million.

title: Are we about to become batteries for AI? A 2030 thought experiment on work, energy and human worth
description: Trending News: An in-depth look at a chilling 2030 thought experiment where AI wipes out most jobs and humans become energy generators for data centres. From the fictional Energym startup featuring AI deepfakes of Elon Musk, Jeff Bezos and Sam Altman, to Black Mirror and The Matrix parallels, this analysis explores how automation, gym culture and energy efficiency could turn human bodies into batteries for artificial intelligence.
content:
In the viral video, by 2030, 80 percent of jobs are gone, and humans generate electricity, offering power to the AI that replaced them/ Image: X
